reviews: Neighborhood is a great place to go after a Padres game, for a few drinks after work, or just to grab a bite to eat.Good food and awesome beers
name: Devin Walker

reviews: Consistently GOOD.This is always the firts stop when we're in SD.Great atmosphere and consistently good food.Their mac 'n' cheese is to die for.
name: Matt Cromwell

reviews: Get the grilled cheese with tomato soup! It's sooo good!And the garlic french fries!The burgers here are good size super delicious, too!
name: Devin Walker

reviews: What a great place to meet friends for good food and great service.From the moment you walk in,the neighborhood staff make you feel right at home
name: Taylor Waldon

reviews: Good Beer.Good Burgers.Great Service.As with any San Diego bar,the beer selection is great with a mix of local and imported options.
name: Maruf Mohanty

reviews: This Quaint little restaurant in downtown SD offers customers a modern twist on traditional food items.The ambiance is perfect.Lively but not too loud
name: Michelle Ames
